title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 04
author: Various
snippet: During hisimprisonment, revenge upon poor Lorimer was his constant theme; and,when the time expired, he removed to the parish of Keir, and foundemployment in a lime-work belonging to Dr. Hunter of Barjarg.
